Uses of Class
com.botticelli.bot.request.methods.AbstractReplyManageToSend

  • Packages that use AbstractReplyManageToSend 
    Package Description
    com.botticelli.bot.request.methods  

    • Uses of AbstractReplyManageToSend in com.botticelli.bot.request.methods

      Subclasses of AbstractReplyManageToSend in com.botticelli.bot.request.methods 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AudioFileToSend
      This object clusters all the data need to the method send Audio (in this case the Audio will be send by a .ogg File)
      class  AudioReferenceToSend
      This object clusters all the data need for the method send Audio (in this case the Audio will be send by file_id)
      class  AudioToSend 
      class  AudioVoiceToSend 
      class  DocumentFileToSend
      This object clusters all the data need for the method sendDocument Bots can currently send files of any type of up to 50 MB in size, this limit may be changed in the future.
      class  DocumentReferenceToSend
      This object clusters all the data need for the method send Document (in this case the Document is a telegram file_id)
      class  LocationToSend
      This object clusters all the data need for the method sendLocation
      class  MessageToSend
      This object clusters all the data need for the method sendMessage
      class  PhotoFileToSend
      This object clusters all the data need to the method sendPhoto (in this case the Photo will be send by File (jpg, png ecc...))
      class  PhotoReferenceToSend
      This object clusters all the data need for the method send Photo (in this case the Photo is a telegram file_id)
      class  PhotoToSend 
      class  StickerFileToSend
      This object clusters all the data need to the method sendSticker (in this case the Sticker will be send by .webp File)
      class  StickerReferenceToSend
      This object clusters all the data need for the method send Sticker (in this case the Sticker is a telegram file_id)
      class  VideoFileToSend
      This object clusters all the data need to the method sendVideo (in this case the Sticker will be send by File) Telegram clients support mp4 videos (other formats may be sent as Document).
      class  VideoReferenceToSend
      This object clusters all the data need for the method send Video (in this case the Video is a telegram file_id)
      class  VoiceFileToSend 
      class  VoiceReferenceToSend
